publicationStmt.p: Digital edition hosted on and GitHub:

bibl.title: Bubble Slide Girl
bibl.ref: Article That Supplied Information for Markup

body.desc: It shows a little girl using a drain pipe as a slide while blowing bubbles. The image shows the girl adapting to her surroundings and finding a playground in an unlikely place, just as society continues to adapt to difficulties in the world around us. The piece has currently removed. On the wall of a Youth Club in Hackney, East London.

p.title: Bubble Slide Girl
p.credit: By: Jacob Helderman from East London, https://hiveminer.com/Tags/banksy%2Cbubbles/Recent
